title: Given Ka - make a buffer with approximate pH of 3

content.prompt: The acid-dissociation constants of HC3H5O3(aq) and CH3NH3+(aq) are given in the table above. Which of the following mixtures is a buffer with a pH of approximately 3?

choices.label: A mixture of 100. mL of 0.1 M CH3NH3Cl and 50. mL of 0.1 M NaOH
A mixture of 100. mL of 0.1 M HC3H5O3 and 50. mL of 0.1 M NaOH
A mixture of 100. mL of 0.1 M NaC3H5O3 and 100. mL of 0.1 M NaOH
A mixture of 100. mL of 0.1 M CH3NH3Cl and 100. mL of 0.1 M CH3NH2

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
